text: Parmotrema appendiculatum is a species of lichen in the family Parmeliaceae. Found in South America, it was originally described by French botanist Antoine Laurent Apollinaire Fée in 1837 as a species of Parmelia. Mason Hale transferred it to the genus Parmotrema in 1974. ==See also== *List of Parmotrema species ==References== Category:Fungi described in 1837 Category:Fungi of South America appendiculatum
title: Parmotrema appendiculatum
